ou3

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • ou3.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentMessage, QueryMessage

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract Class Message. Containing functionality to send messages throughout the Network by processing, updating and sending them.
    See Also:
    QueryMessage, AgentMessage, Network

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(Node position)
        Instantiates a new message.
        Parameters:
        position - the Node position created at

    • Method Detail

      • choseTarget

        protected abstract Node choseTarget()
        Chose target. Abstract method to be implemented. Must return the node to which a message will move next; used in the sendMessage().
        Returns:
        the node to move to

      • processMessage

        public abstract void processMessage()
        Process message. Abstract method to be implemented. The Messages will have different processes to perform at each timeStep, they will be done by this.

      • stepUpdate

        public abstract boolean stepUpdate()
        Step update. Abstract method to be implemented. The Messages will update differently at each timeStep, this method must return whether they survive (true) to the next step.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • sendingUpdate

        protected abstract void sendingUpdate()
        Sending update. Abstract method to be implemented. The Messages will behave differently as they are sent. This method will be called during the sendMessage().
        See Also:
        sendMessage()

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage()
        Send the Message, performing all actions neccesary during this moment. First chose target, then do the sendingUpdate() and add the currentPosition to the past, also add the Neighbours. Then set the currentPosition to the target. Also set the Node s inactive. Return whether the target was active, used to see whether queueing is neccesary.
        Returns:
        true, if the target was active

      • setTimeToLive

        public void setTimeToLive(int t)
        Sets the time to live.
        Parameters:
        t - the new time to live

      • getCandidates

        private Node[] getCandidates()
        Gets the candidates.
        Returns:
        the candidates

      • crossReference

        private java.util.ArrayList<Node> crossReference(Node[] neighbours)
        Cross reference the neighbours with the past positions visited.
        Parameters:
        neighbours - the neighbours
        Returns:
        the array list of nodes not seen earlier

      • findNewPath

        protected Node findNewPath()
        Find new path. Standard method of chosing a target for sending. Will try to avoid Node s already seen.
        Returns:
        the Node target

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String information about the Message.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String information
        See Also:
        Object.toString()

      • getPoint

        public java.awt.Point getPoint()
        Get the position of the Node at which the Message is
        Returns:
        Position of current Node

      • decrement_TTL

        protected void decrement_TTL()
        Decrement time to live for a message
